attributes.review: This app is so bad, don’t get it or you’ll support an awful racist president who has done nothing to help the people, and in a time of a pandemic wants to slow down testing.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: This app is a dumb waste of time I wanted to know why I should vote for my president again but instead I found why I should definitely not 😘
attributes.title: All lives matter🧚‍♀️✨Except for Trumps ✨🌸

attributes.userName: no buy just dont buy no
attributes.review: let’s start off by saying how HORRIBLE this app is. i cannot stress enough that this app is HORRIBLE. it actually is so bad that it caused my family member to pass away. surely the creator should be held responsible for this. TAKE THIS APP DOWN!! it caused a death!!
attributes.title: disgrace

attributes.review: It’s a horrible app and I think it should be permanently deleted from the App Store I do not enjoy this app at all. Delete the big orange guy!!!0/10 if I could I would do o stars but I can’t

attributes.review: This app is so super slow and it doesn’t even let me it in my phone number when u know that is it. It’s also very stupid honestly and it’s just not a good app.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and convince myself our president wasn’t an idiot. I was shocked because I found the complete opposite. In fact, I was so shocked I was sent into cardiac arrest and nearly died.
attributes.title: It sent me into cardiac arrest.

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I needed a way to get updates on the Presidents campaign, but unfortunately it was too glitchy. I completely hated it.
